long_description: The REI Lunch Cooler keeps your meal fresh and a beverage cold while you're at work or on a picnic. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours; foam also protects fruit from bruising. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. Zippered exterior pocket holds utensils and napkins (sold separately). Haul handle and adjustable shoulder strap let you easily transport the REI Lunch Cooler.
short_description: The REI Lunch Cooler keeps your meal fresh and a beverage cold while you're at work or on a picnic.
